name: Offroad Cargo Hill: Russian Tr
description:
Offroad Cargo Hill: Russian Truck Driver 3 is specially designed for the truck drive lover who loves to drive big real truck. Your transporter truck might be carrying dangerous cargo so drive carefully.
Features:
Different Types
Euro Truck Driving Experience
Different Game Play
Different Types of Handling
Different camera Views
Realistic Physics
Real Life Euro Truck Sounds
Most Realistic off-road Truck Design
